content: Bank Account Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Dec 2018Procedure after CDP securities account accepted?Intended to buy SSB, just received my CDP number. Letter states to wait for the DCS notification letter. Any actions to be taken or just wait? Can I just buy SSB via iBanking since I have the CDP acc no?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Your CDP Securities account has to be linked to your bank account through direct crediting service (DCS) first. Afterwards then you can apply via ATM or internet banking.2 comments0

Question Poster15 Dec 2018How long will I receive the DCS letter after CDP approval? Lok Yang Teng16 Dec 2018You will receive a letter from SGX informing you on the final status of the application within 2 weeks from the application date (acceptance or rejection)
